Name: Pirate
Script: Before Combat: if(target.name == ~Pirate~){ self.firstwords = ~Yarrr[;] matey! Ye be-[newline]What the fuck.~; self.alwaysspeakfirstwords = true; self.canspeakfirstwords = true; }
Last Words 1: Aye I'm far from the sea but a fella like me?||Though the ocean's apart I'm a pirate at heart!
Last Words 2: A pirate cares nothing for 'win' or for 'lose'.|A pirate cares only for fighting and booze!
Last Words 3: See my beard! Ye admire it?|It's 'cos I'm a pirate!
Last Words Endgame: Arrrr[;] good to see ye back! Ye'll not find it easier just because|ye beat Lady Luck once[;] yer know...

Name: Copycat
Script: On Start Turn: delay(0.1); for(eq in self.equipment){ if(eq.getvar(~redice~).length > 0){ var redice = eq.getvar(~redice~); for(value in redice){ eq.script += ~if(d == ~ + value + ~) bonus(100);~; } } }
Last Words 1: I know you are[;] but what am I?[]
Last Words 2: I'm rubber[;] you're glue. Bounces off|me and sticks to you!
